testcase.name: JsonSchemaValidatorInputStream

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["DeliveredTime"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["BranchId","DeliveredTime","FoodOrder","OrderTime","RestaurantName"] missing: ["DeliveredTime"]
Actual: { "id": "937d", "RestaurantName": "SS Hyderbad Biriyani", "BranchId": 123, "FoodOrder": [ "2 Chicken Biriyani", "1 Chicken Grill", "2 Fish Fry" ], "OrderTime": "12:45 pm" }
